lead_paragraph: The decision for a district attorney to turn the case over to the attorney general also means that a grand jury’s prior finding has also been set aside.

headline.print_headline: Schneiderman  Takes Over Case  of Killing in Troy
headline.main: New York Attorney General to Investigate Police Shooting in Troy

snippet: The decision for a district attorney to turn the case over to the attorney general also means that a grand jury’s prior finding has also been set aside.
abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman announces that he is taking over inquiry into fatal shooting of black motorist Edson Thevenin by Troy Police Officer Randy French.
